module Hails.Graphics.UI.Gtk.Simplify.RootLogger
installHandlers :: (GtkGUI a, Event c, MenuItemClass d) => CEnv a b c -> (ViewElementAccessorIO (GtkView a) d) -> IO ()
installHandlersUnique :: (GtkGUI a, Event c, MenuItemClass d) => CEnv a b c -> (ViewElementAccessorIO (GtkView a) d) -> IO ()
instance LogHandler ListStoreLogHandler

module Hails.Graphics.UI.Gtk.Simplify.ProgramMainWindow
installHandlers :: (GtkGUI a, Event c) => CEnv a b c -> (ViewElementAccessorIO (GtkView a) Window) -> IO ()
condition :: (GtkGUI a, Event c) => CEnv a b c -> IO Bool

module Hails.MVC.Model.ProtectedModel.NamedModel
class NamedBasicModel a
getBMName :: NamedBasicModel a => a -> String
class NamedProtectedModel a
getName :: NamedProtectedModel a => a -> IO String
deriveNamed :: Name -> Q [Dec]
instance (Event b, NamedBasicModel a) => NamedProtectedModel (ProtectedModel a b)

module Hails.MVC.Model.ProtectedModel.LoggedModel
class LoggedBasicModel a
getBMLogName :: LoggedBasicModel a => a -> String
class LoggedProtectedModel a
getLogName :: LoggedProtectedModel a => a -> IO String
getLog :: LoggedProtectedModel a => a -> IO Logger
deriveLogged :: Name -> Q [Dec]
instance (Event b, LoggedBasicModel a) => LoggedProtectedModel (ProtectedModel a b)

module Hails.Graphics.UI.Gtk.Simplify.Logger
installHandlers :: (GtkGUI a, LoggedBasicModel b, Event c, MenuItemClass d) => CEnv a b c -> (ViewElementAccessorIO (GtkView a) d) -> IO ()
installHandlersUnique :: (GtkGUI a, LoggedBasicModel b, Event c, MenuItemClass d) => CEnv a b c -> (ViewElementAccessorIO (GtkView a) d) -> IO ()
instance LogHandler ListStoreLogHandler

module Hails.MVC.Model.ProtectedModel.VersionedModel
class VersionedBasicModel a
getBMVersion :: VersionedBasicModel a => a -> Version
class VersionedProtectedModel a
getVersion :: VersionedProtectedModel a => a -> IO Version
deriveVersioned :: Name -> Q [Dec]
instance (Event b, VersionedBasicModel a) => VersionedProtectedModel (ProtectedModel a b)

module Hails.MVC.Model.ProtectedModel.UpdatableModel
class VersionedBasicModel a => UpdatableBasicModel a
getBMUpdateURI :: UpdatableBasicModel a => a -> String
getBMMaxVersionAvail :: UpdatableBasicModel a => a -> Maybe Version
setBMMaxVersionAvail :: UpdatableBasicModel a => a -> Version -> a
class VersionedProtectedModel a => UpdatableProtectedModel a
getUpdateURI :: UpdatableProtectedModel a => a -> IO String
getMaxVersionAvail :: UpdatableProtectedModel a => a -> IO (Maybe Version)
setMaxVersionAvail :: UpdatableProtectedModel a => a -> Version -> IO ()
class Event a => UpdateNotifiableEvent a
updateNotificationEvent :: UpdateNotifiableEvent a => a
instance (UpdatableBasicModel a, UpdateNotifiableEvent b) => UpdatableProtectedModel (ProtectedModel a b)

module Hails.Graphics.UI.Gtk.Simplify.UpdateCheck
installHandlers :: (GtkGUI a, UpdatableBasicModel b, UpdateNotifiableEvent c) => CEnv a b c -> (ViewElementAccessorIO (GtkView a) (ReactiveFieldActivatable IO)) -> IO ()
condition :: (GtkGUI a, UpdatableBasicModel b, UpdateNotifiableEvent c) => CEnv a b c -> IO ()
netRead :: Read a => String -> IO (Either String a)
constantlyHandle :: a -> SomeException -> a

-- | Download a URL. (Left errorMessage) if an error, - (Right doc) if
--   success.
downloadURL :: String -> IO (Either String String)

installHandlers :: (GtkGUI a, VersionedBasicModel b, Event c) => CEnv a b c -> (ViewElementAccessorIO (GtkView a) Window) -> IO ()

-- | Condition: The page of the main notebook visible at each moment is the
